name: Circus Circus Reno Hotel & Casino
description: Part of THE ROW in downtown Reno, Circus Circus features 1,572 rooms across two towers connected to Silver Legacy and Eldorado via enclosed skywalks. The family-friendly resort offers a full casino, the Midway with carnival games and free circus acts, multiple dining options, and easy access to downtown Reno's entertainment district.
shortDescription: Budget-friendly casino with free circus acts, family entertainment, and THE ROW complex access.
highlights: Only circus-themed casino in Northern Nevada

roomTypes.name: Deluxe Room
roomTypes.description: Upgraded rooms with Sierra or city views.

parking: Free parking in Silver Legacy garage

faqs.question: Is Circus Circus connected to other casinos?
faqs.answer: Yes — Circus Circus is part of THE ROW, connected to Silver Legacy and Eldorado via enclosed skywalks. You can walk between all three properties without going outside.

faqs.question: Is Circus Circus good for families?
faqs.answer: Absolutely — the Midway features carnival games, free daily circus acts, and a family-friendly atmosphere that makes it one of Reno's best options for families.

faqs.question: Does Circus Circus offer golf packages?
faqs.answer: Yes — Golf the High Sierra creates custom packages with Circus Circus lodging and tee times at 20+ courses. Call 888-584-8232 for a free quote.
